column4: Can I set it so that Ubuntu only allows one instance of a program? I keep clicking on the "launch Gaim" shortcut instaed of the status icon.
So then it launches two and disconnects me
it's annoying that MSN only lets you be in one place at a time... facists
i run an msn for each one of my systems. So my friends can contact me whether im at work, on one pc, the laptop, or another :)
